snippet: Russian prosecutors opened a legal case against the Kostroma Center for failing to register as a “foreign agent” after it took part in a round table with American Embassy representatives.
abstract: Russian prosecutors open legal case against nongovernmental group Kostroma Center for failing to register as 'foreign agent' after it took part in round table with American Embassy representatives.
lead_paragraph: Russian prosecutors opened a legal case against the Kostroma Center for failing to register as a “foreign agent” after it took part in a round table with American Embassy representatives.

headline.seo: Russia Prosecuting Kostroma Center Under ‘Foreign Agent’ Law
headline.main: Russian Group Fears Fine After Talk With Americans
headline.print_headline: Russian Group Fears Fine After Talk With Americans

keywords.value: Kostroma Center for the Defense of Public Initiatives
